DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine Korean red ginseng ( KRG ) treatment could decrease central blood pressure subject hypertension .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Korean Red Ginseng Central Blood Pressure Patient With Essential Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: Participants hypertension treat antihypertensive agent randomly assign active ( KRG 2 g/day ) placebo treatment group double-blind cross manner . Participants allow change antihypertensive medication except safety issue . Brachial systolic BP ( SBP ) , diastolic BP ( DBP ) , Central SBP DBP measure baseline , 2 4 month . Efficacy safety data monitor Daegu Catholic University Medical Center Institutional Review Board report Korean Ginseng Society .
DOC.criteria: Essential hypertension diastolic blood pressure 100 mmHg less systolic blood pressure 160 mmHg less Secondary hypertension Serum creatinin 1.5 mg/dL aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) alanine aminotransferaseALT two time upper normal limit Uncontrolled diabetes ( Hb A1c < 9 % ) Acute myocardial infarction coronary artery disease intervention within six month Moderate severe congestive heart failure HIV positive Immunocompromized host Allergy Korean red ginseng Pregnancy plan pregnancy Alcohol drug abuse Attend clinical trial within 12 week
